static.name: Static
static.desc: 30% chance a Pokemon making contact with this Pokemon will be paralyzed.
static.shortDesc: 30% chance of paralyzing Pokemon making contact with this Pokemon.

blaze.name: Blaze
blaze.desc: When this Pokemon has 1/3 or less of its maximum HP, rounded down, its attacking stat is multiplied by 1.5 while using a Fire-type attack.
blaze.shortDesc: At 1/3 or less of its max HP, this Pokemon's offensive stat is 1.5x with Fire attacks.

overgrow.name: Overgrow
overgrow.desc: When this Pokemon has 1/3 or less of its maximum HP, rounded down, its attacking stat is multiplied by 1.5 while using a Grass-type attack.
overgrow.shortDesc: At 1/3 or less of its max HP, this Pokemon's offensive stat is 1.5x with Grass attacks.

torrent.name: Torrent
torrent.desc: When this Pokemon has 1/3 or less of its maximum HP, rounded down, its attacking stat is multiplied by 1.5 while using a Water-type attack.
torrent.shortDesc: At 1/3 or less of its max HP, this Pokemon's offensive stat is 1.5x with Water attacks.

lightningrod.name: Lightning Rod
lightningrod.desc: This Pokemon is immune to Electric-type moves and raises its Special Attack by 1 stage when hit by an Electric-type move.
lightningrod.shortDesc: This Pokemon draws Electric moves to itself to raise Sp. Atk by 1; Electric immunity.

solarpower.name: Solar Power
solarpower.desc: If Sunny Day is active, this Pokemon's Special Attack is multiplied by 1.5 and it loses 1/8 of its maximum HP, rounded down, at the end of each turn.
solarpower.shortDesc: If Sunny Day is active, this Pokemon's Sp. Atk is 1.5x; loses 1/8 max HP per turn.

chlorophyll.name: Chlorophyll
chlorophyll.desc: If Sunny Day is active, this Pokemon's Speed is doubled.
chlorophyll.shortDesc: If Sunny Day is active, this Pokemon's Speed is doubled.

raindish.name: Rain Dish
raindish.desc: If Rain Dance is active, this Pokemon restores 1/16 of its maximum HP, rounded down, at the end of each turn.
raindish.shortDesc: If Rain Dance is active, this Pokemon heals 1/16 of its max HP each turn.
